column4: I'm trying to launch a java application, but it seems i don't have java installed, which package is best suited for this? (I only run CLI on the server, so don't want anything gui)
Anyone that could point me at the right direction?
or jdk if you need that

i'm pasting you something in PM, is that ok?
enable that repo and then use sudo apt-get install sun-java6-jre
